line.comment: * If $target is an array, the sector must be specified at index [3].
* This script now acts as a part of any default move (along with Mayhem.Task.Move).
* Jump to destination beacon. We check again the nearest beacon in case $target is a (moving) object.
* Tell support ships to either dock or follow. Real "followers" are not concerned (they should move to their leader sector from their own script when needed).
* Tell them to stay into the ship until sector change.
* Tell support ships that they can undock to attack targets if any (see Mayhem.Task.Support).

sval.val: If $target is an array, the sector must be specified at index [3].
This script now acts as a part of any default move (along with Mayhem.Task.Move).
Jump to destination beacon. We check again the nearest beacon in case $target is a (moving) object.
Tell support ships to either dock or follow. Real "followers" are not concerned (they should move to their leader sector from their own script when needed).
Tell them to stay into the ship until sector change.
Tell support ships that they can undock to attack targets if any (see Mayhem.Task.Support).
